Module it.polimi.ingsw.psp40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp40.model

Class Island

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp40.commons.Publisher<Message>
it.polimi.ingsw.psp40.model.Island
public class Island
extends Publisher<Message>
This is the class for the Island (billboard) we called island because billboard is longer and less cool
Author:
sup3rgiu, TiberioG
